name: Separaliens
description:
PLAY IT ON LILUO.IO

Storyline

The main objective is to escape the lab. They captured you and your friend because you are an alien. You need to switch between characters to complete puzzles, dodge enemies, and open doors.

Controls

WASDMove the selected characterCSwitch charactersHShow the description of the roomESCPause the game

Button System

Buttons are color-coded, and you need to press them in order. Most of the time it's pretty easy to guess, sometimes you'll find hints for it.

 BlueBlue buttons can be pressed by the blue alien.
 RedRed buttons can be pressed by the red alien.
 OrangeYou need to place a box on orange buttons to press them. YellowYellow buttons can deactivate something.

How to escape when you get caught?

If you get caught, you need to switch to the other character and get the key from the first room. After that pass the key into the captured character's cell. Now it will be able to open the cell door.

If both characters get caught you need to restart the level.
